sentences.sContent: Haiti’s first elected President was deposed in a violent military coup .
sentences.sCn: 海地的第一位民选总统在一场动荡的军事政变中被废黜。

sentences.sContent: a coup attempt by junior officers
sentences.sCn: 低级军官发动的一场军事政变

sentences.sContent: He evaded capture after the failed coup .
sentences.sCn: 政变失败后他逃脱了抓捕。

synos.tran: 政变；妙计；出乎意料的行动；砰然的一击

remMethod.val: “酷” → 一夜暴富真得挺酷 → 成功之举

trans.tranCn: 砰然而有效的一击, 妙计, 出乎意料的行动, 政变
trans.tranOther: a sudden and sometimes violent attempt by citizens or the army to take control of the government
